law.text:
In this subtitle, "action" means:
the adoption of a local law or regulation concerning:
a special exception under § 1-101(p) of this title (Definitions - "Special exception"); or
plan implementation and review under § 1-417 of this title or § 3-303 of this article;
a requirement under § 9-505(a)(1) of the Environment Article and Article 23A, § 19(o)(3)(iii) of the Code (Municipal annexation); or
a required finding under §§ 9-506(a)(1) and 9-507(b)(2) of the Environment Article (Water and sewer plan review).
